data.eml:eml: Redefinition and revision of African Cosmetra Diakonoff, 1977 (Lepidoptera: Tortricidae) with description of six new species

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Aarvik, Leif (2016): Redefinition and revision of African Cosmetra Diakonoff, 1977 (Lepidoptera: Tortricidae) with description of six new species. Zootaxa 4088 (2): 245-256, DOI: 10.11646/zootaxa.4088.2.6
